referenceObject.reference: Ferretti, N., Nicoletta, M. & Soresi, D. S. (2024). An integrative taxonomy approach evaluates the limits of the widespread tarantula Plesiopelma longisternale (Araneae: Mygalomorphae: Theraphosidae) and reveals a new species from Argentina. Zoologischer Anzeiger 308: 131-143.
